text: Fashion world is huge. Nowadays, we can't see fashion as only wearing clothes and taking pictures. Fashion must contain a message. It must spread values, ideas, and has an impact on global politics. People are influenced by this industry : they will wear what they see, listen to what messages are told to them, and assimilate some major ideas. Nowadays issues are represented by the fashion industry thanks to designers, photographers, writers ; global warming has taken a peak of popularity thanks to famous people spreading the message through social media and collaborations. New generation is not interested by strict-polite-formulations of politicians' speeches. They want people to tell them what is going on more simply and more directly. Here is where fashion makes sense : Books, interviews… The list is long, but the results are pretty much the same : New ideas and easier ways to comprehend things. Then so, we can today talk about subjects that were seen offensive or inappropriate before : sex, sexual orientations, gap between cultures, racism ; all of that with a progressive and new vision of beauty sense. I want to work for fashion designers that spread the good messages, people who see the world as a blank paint and spread real and honest values. 🙂
